item.title: Amazon's CloudFront Moves In for Content Delivery
item.description:
Amazon has expanded far beyond bookselling; it’s now a major player in network computing. Recognizing the value of their massive infrastructure, Amazon created Amazon Web Services (AWS) to offer cloud computing resources to businesses of all sizes. AWS includes a range of services, such as Amazon EC2 for computing power, Amazon S3 for storage, and Amazon CloudFront for content delivery. Amazon’s global network, with numerous edge locations, makes it well-suited for content delivery...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/amazons-cloudfront-moves-in-for-content-delivery/
